    Static Public

    public format(val: number, opts: Object): * source 

    import {format} from 'swarm-numberformat/src/format.js'

    Format a number using the default options.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    val number
    opts Object
    • optional

    Return:

    *

    string

    Example:

    format(1e6)
// => "1.0000 million"
    format(1e6, {sigfigs: 1})
// => "1 million"

    public formatFull(val: number, opts: Object): * source 

    import {formatFull} from 'swarm-numberformat/src/format.js'

    Format a full-flavor number using the default options. Identical to format()

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    val number
    opts Object
    • optional

    Return:

    *

    string

    Example:

    format(1e6)
// => "1.0000 million"

    import {formatShort} from 'swarm-numberformat/src/format.js'

    Return:

    Example:

    format(1e6)
